Weighted LDA Models

Weighted_LDA.Rmd

Weighted LDA

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
out <- weightedLDA(docs             = keyATM_docs,  # text input
                   number_of_topics = 7,            # number of topics
                   model            = "base",       # select the model
                   options          = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##         Topic_1     Topic_2     Topic_3      Topic_4       Topic_5
## 1        health    research       court   management    electronic
## 2          care    national         law      project          mean
## 3  subparagraph      center      action     wildlife        report
## 4          date    director      person       public         issue
## 5      describe  technology        code       system          term
## 6     provision    activity enforcement         land           law
## 7    individual    standard    district     national       require
## 8       respect   establish       crime        water        person
## 9        period development        drug      coastal communication
## 10    amendment     purpose       civil conservation           air
##           Topic_6     Topic_7
## 1        facility   education
## 2      commission       grant
## 3        congress      school
## 4          report      public
## 5         veteran       local
## 6           house educational
## 7          senate         end
## 8  representative     student
## 9       committee        part
## 10       property       carry

Weighted LDA Covariates

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
bills_cov <- keyATM_data_bills$cov
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
out <- weightedLDA(docs             = keyATM_docs,   # text input
                   number_of_topics = 7,             # number of topics
                   model            = "covariates",  # select the model
                   model_settings   = list(covariates_data = bills_cov),
                   options          = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##        Topic_1    Topic_2     Topic_3      Topic_4      Topic_5     Topic_6
## 1          law     action       grant       health     national      school
## 2  enforcement commission    research subparagraph   management   education
## 3        crime      court    national       public     wildlife educational
## 4        child     person    director         care         land     student
## 5     attorney       term     project    amendment        water    facility
## 6         code electronic    activity       senate       system       local
## 7       person   security      center          end      coastal requirement
## 8      offense       rule  technology       follow conservation    describe
## 9     criminal        law       carry     congress          air        part
## 10       minor     report appropriate     describe         fish      waiver
##       Topic_7
## 1  individual
## 2     veteran
## 3      report
## 4        high
## 5   determine
## 6        cost
## 7      entity
## 8       house
## 9      follow
## 10    network

Weighted LDA Dynamic

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
bills_time_index <- keyATM_data_bills$time_index
bills_time_index <- as.integer(bills_time_index - 100)
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
fitted <- weightedLDA(docs             = keyATM_docs,  # text input
                      number_of_topics = 7,            # number of topics
                      model            = "dynamic",    # select the model
                      model_settings   = list(time_index = bills_time_index, 
                                              num_states = 5),
                      options          = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##        Topic_1    Topic_2     Topic_3      Topic_4      Topic_5     Topic_6
## 1          law     action       grant       health     national      school
## 2  enforcement commission    research subparagraph   management   education
## 3        crime      court    national       public     wildlife educational
## 4        child     person    director         care         land     student
## 5     attorney       term     project    amendment        water    facility
## 6         code electronic    activity       senate       system       local
## 7       person   security      center          end      coastal requirement
## 8      offense       rule  technology       follow conservation    describe
## 9     criminal        law       carry     congress          air        part
## 10       minor     report appropriate     describe         fish      waiver
##       Topic_7
## 1  individual
## 2     veteran
## 3      report
## 4        high
## 5   determine
## 6        cost
## 7      entity
## 8       house
## 9      follow
## 10    network
